about_the_game:
A reality mystery drama chasing after 'humans' instead of the 'tricks'




- The Shadows of Fallen City is a reality mystery drama that tracks a violent incident caused by someone's fall, as people who have fallen with different stories gathering in a city where common sense and human relationships have fallen.

- The Shadows of Fallen City has no such thing as a genius criminal nor criminal group who deceives people with sly tricks. It's just about the people who experienced a huge failure, broken down from hitting the wall of the world, or people who haven't got a decent chance to spread their wings due to prejudice, people who have a lot but not satisfied...

[It is a storytelling adventure that sheds light on 'human' and 'relationships' through the so-called the [i]'fallen people'[/i].

Crime scene and interrogation oriented mystery adventure


- The scene that the main character and their group face at first does not look so special. However, as the investigation continues, incomprehensible evidences will be found, and they will reveal the distorted desires of various people when you gather the information altogether to reason the truth one by one.
Their desires will show the detected evidences in different perspectives, and the main story will be about the turning of the cases and reaching to the solution through these desires.



-The development is ongoing to be an authentic social mystery drama that provides a high sense of immersion by capturing social satire from illuminating people related to events rather than the case itself, and sometimes reveals the heartless, cold human, but at the end that who reveals the humane warmth.

Multiple endings and hidden epilogues behind


- Most of the cases will lead to the so-called normal endings with an acceptable arrest of the suspect from the evidence and testimony. However, if you find the critical clue among the fact, you can reach to the true ending from uncovering the actual convict and their procedure of the crime.

- You can obtain hidden testimony after eliciting a special conversation during the interrogation. The hidden testimony will show why a specific character would do such action during the case regardless of endings in the epilogue. The case will be solved completely when all of the true ending and epilogues are combined.
